title: MStore Release Notes
text: The MStore release notes can be found at the link https://docu.k3btg.com/view/950408023/. If you are on any release from 2024 onwards, you can also click on Help and About in the MStore back office to find the release notes. Please raise a Service Request support ticket if you would like to request an upgrade, and note the guidance in the articles in MStore Versions & Operating Environment. Click on the page below to go straight to the release notes. This is how you can go direct to the release notes from the MStore back office.
folder: Further MStore help, links, and more
description:
The MStore release notes can be found at the link https://docu.k3btg.com/view/950408023/. If you are on any release from 2024 onwards, you can also click on Help and About in the MStore back office to find the release notes.


Please raise a Service Request support ticket if you would like to request an upgrade, and note the guidance in the articles in MStore Versions & Operating Environment.


Click on the page below to go straight to the release notes.



This is how you can go direct to the release notes from the MStore back office.

title: K3 MStore Product Roadmap
text: TABLE OF CONTENTS In Progress Next Later Completed In Progress Web: Customer Portal to move bookings Web: Customer Portal to edit bookings Excel export prompt when creating batch internet vouchers Next Enhancement: Add Booking reference to invoice search results grid. DNA Payments – Direct Link payments via back office DNA Payments – Refunds via back office using tokens DNA Payments – Bulk refunds using tokens for cancellations (Events/Sessions) Enhancement: Promotions Change to stop removal of promotions when accounts are added to transactions Enhancement: Customer Titles lookup Groups/Lookups to control titles in house. Customer Portal to support “contact us” emailing Later Go Cardless DD Integration Donorfy integration Amount discounts on POS. Extending coupons to have a value for this type of promotion with a sum threshold before being allowed to trigger, with exclusions if any items don’t count toward the value POS: Promotions. Meal Deal Promo Enhancement Enhancement: Web: OAuth 2.0 to replace SMTP Enhancement: Batch Mailer: OAuth 2.0 to replace SMTP BOS: SMS / Email emergency messaging Web: Session time cut off based on session type POS: Promotions. Meal Deal Promo Enhancement Completed Enhancement: Min and Max per Location Web: BKG Resource Blurbs added to confirmation emails Web: Session Dependency Link (Online) Enhancement: Pin Numbers: Add data integrity checks Enhancement: POS & BOS to clear local photos upon load Web/BOS/POS: Max Member visits per session type Web: Booking fee based on % of basket total Enhancement: Disallow PLU from Promotions Web/BOS/POS: Split Session capacity without seating plan Web: URL Tag to swap CSS website designs BOS: Booking Audit Logs Enhancement: Suppress timeline pop ups Enhancement: Add/Subtract Member Points in BOS Web: Session Type selection page + Images POS – Multiple Tiered Member discounts WEB: Digital Wallets for Memberships Enhancement: Stock Import (Allowing stock locations and stock quantities to be listed on importing data) Enhancement: New Security Group > Account Suspended Enhancement: PO Change to round to 4 decimal places Enhancement: Stock Movements - Export to Excel WEB: Member Postcode validation for sign ups and renewals (Checks editable list) WEB: Ticket Pictures on booking pages WEB: Suppress follow on template Calendar WEB: What's on Event carousel below calendar Web: landing/home pages WEB: Digital Wallets: Ability to add Tickets and Memberships to the Android/Apple wallet from the customer portal, from the booking confirmation screen and in the email confirmation Enhancement: POS Pennies – Round UP to the nearest £ BOS/POS: Account Number Prefix system option BOS: Live Cards – Expire Live cards (Creating sales, £0 balance, set inactive > than x days) BOS: Loyalty Points enhancements WEB/BOS: Unique Vouchers – Formatting and redemption enhancements APP: Android Stock take App – new feature for replacing stock quantities BOS: Diary Screen improvements BOS/POS/WEB: Tethering Sessions: Sessions and tours to allow auto disabling if one in the linked groups is booked BOS: Transactions for Renewing DDs BOS: Postage cost matrix for adding and changing postage costs BOS: Postage cost matrix for adding and changing postage costs BOS: Inactive time, set per user. Auto log off users off if they have been inactive for a period time. WEB: New Payment Integration: DNA Payments Online Payment Gateway APP: Android Stock take app POS: Covers Prompt option WEB: Session time background colours based on capacity + Key (V 1.5 or above) APP: Android Access control scanning app BOS/POS: Add details box to auto populate the POS. INTEGRATION: The ability for our customers to sell tickets through any of the supported ticketing providers that use TXGB BOS: Enhancement: Stock – Internal notes box. Visible within PO Screen. BOS: Enhancement: PLU Commission rates (Similar to account commission rates)BOS/POS: BOS: Enhancement: Account based commission rates API: Stage 2: Allow tracking via API to log communication and bookings made by 3rd parties POS: Enhancement: Extend restricted panels to security groups. WEB: Enhancement: Web Config: Hide Session End time per TID. WEB: Internet Promotions: Exclusion Dates on Internet Promotions INTEGRATION: Enhancement: N-gage.io app integration for bookings and membership entry. WEB: Customer Portal: Functionality for visitors and members to see their bookings, resend emails, generate codes to gain access, view memberships status, renew, change contact details. WEB: Enhancement: Next Gen Web Ticketing: Full revamp of our Web Site Engine, bringing it to more modern standards, making it easier and to update and maintain, and use more modern architectural principles to address availability issue WEB: MS Clarity behavioral analytics tool BOS: Back Office: New Icon to open customer search directly BOS: PO Screen: Default to order by description ascending rather than auto ID. BOS: Permissions: Security option to allow users to amend employee departments. BOS: Purchase Orders: Qty in Stock, whole site not just by location, Sold in last 14 days the same BOS: Stock take: Add Stock area list to append to description in BO BOS: Export Account History information to Excel POS: DNA Payments EFT Integration WEB: DNA Payments Online WEB: Block seats from being sold online and reduce capacity INTEGRATION: Loqate Postcode Lookup integration BOS: Sage Intacct integration WEB: Attach PDF copy of confirmation email in confirmation WEB: Attach documents to confirmation emails INTEGRATION: TOP/POP: Improvements to service availability DB: Capacity speed enhancements for events BOS: Bulk update cost and retail prices POS: Return visit enhancements BOS: Iplicit accounts integration BOS: Bulk batch internet promotion cloning WEB: Single use internet promotion codes INTEGRATION: Business Central Integration BOS: Bulk cancelling and refunding events WEB: Add the ability to support the Karna payment system as a method of payment within Stripe/DNA Payments – Alongside Android Pay, Apple Pay and Google Pay. INTEGRATION: Google Address Search: Natural language entry of customer addresses to our web engine for faster checkout experience WEB: Seating plan Overlay to show seating plans before choosing tickets.
folder: Further MStore help, links, and more
description:
TABLE OF CONTENTS

  • In Progress
  • Next
  • Later
  • Completed





In Progress


Web: Customer Portal to move bookings
Web: Customer Portal to edit bookings
Excel export prompt when creating batch internet vouchers




Next


Enhancement: Add Booking reference to invoice search results grid.
DNA Payments – Direct Link payments via back office
DNA Payments – Refunds via back office using tokens
DNA Payments – Bulk refunds using tokens for cancellations (Events/Sessions)
Enhancement: Promotions Change to stop removal of promotions when accounts are added to transactions
Enhancement: Customer Titles lookup Groups/Lookups to control titles in house.
Customer Portal to support “contact us” emailing




Later


Go Cardless DD Integration
Donorfy integration
Amount discounts on POS. Extending coupons to have a value for this type of promotion with a sum threshold before being allowed to trigger, with exclusions if any items don’t count toward the value
POS: Promotions. Meal Deal Promo Enhancement
Enhancement: Web: OAuth 2.0 to replace SMTP
Enhancement: Batch Mailer: OAuth 2.0 to replace SMTP
BOS: SMS / Email emergency messaging
Web: Session time cut off based on session type
POS: Promotions. Meal Deal Promo Enhancement




Completed


Enhancement: Min and Max per Location
Web: BKG Resource Blurbs added to confirmation emails
Web: Session Dependency Link (Online)
Enhancement: Pin Numbers: Add data integrity checks
Enhancement: POS & BOS to clear local photos upon load
Web/BOS/POS: Max Member visits per session type
Web: Booking fee based on % of basket total
Enhancement: Disallow PLU from Promotions
Web/BOS/POS: Split Session capacity without seating plan
Web: URL Tag to swap CSS website designs
BOS: Booking Audit Logs
Enhancement: Suppress timeline pop ups
Enhancement: Add/Subtract Member Points in BOS
Web: Session Type selection page + Images
POS – Multiple Tiered Member discounts
WEB: Digital Wallets for Memberships
Enhancement: Stock Import (Allowing stock locations and stock quantities to be listed on importing data)
Enhancement: New Security Group > Account Suspended
Enhancement: PO Change to round to 4 decimal places
Enhancement: Stock Movements - Export to Excel
WEB: Member Postcode validation for sign ups and renewals (Checks editable list)
WEB: Ticket Pictures on booking pages
WEB: Suppress follow on template Calendar
WEB: What's on Event carousel below calendar
Web: landing/home pages
WEB: Digital Wallets: Ability to add Tickets and Memberships to the Android/Apple wallet from the customer portal, from the booking confirmation screen and in the email confirmation
Enhancement: POS Pennies – Round UP to the nearest £
BOS/POS: Account Number Prefix system option
BOS: Live Cards – Expire Live cards (Creating sales, £0 balance, set inactive > than x days)
BOS: Loyalty Points enhancements
WEB/BOS: Unique Vouchers – Formatting and redemption enhancements
APP: Android Stock take App – new feature for replacing stock quantities
BOS: Diary Screen improvements
BOS/POS/WEB: Tethering Sessions: Sessions and tours to allow auto disabling if one in the linked groups is booked
BOS: Transactions for Renewing DDs
BOS: Postage cost matrix for adding and changing postage costs
BOS: Postage cost matrix for adding and changing postage costs
BOS: Inactive time, set per user. Auto log off users off if they have been inactive for a period time.
WEB: New Payment Integration: DNA Payments Online Payment Gateway
APP: Android Stock take app
POS: Covers Prompt option
WEB: Session time background colours based on capacity + Key (V 1.5 or above)
APP: Android Access control scanning app
BOS/POS: Add details box to auto populate the POS.
INTEGRATION: The ability for our customers to sell tickets through any of the supported ticketing providers that use TXGB
BOS: Enhancement: Stock – Internal notes box. Visible within PO Screen. 
BOS: Enhancement: PLU Commission rates (Similar to account commission rates)BOS/POS:
BOS: Enhancement: Account based commission rates
API: Stage 2: Allow tracking via API to log communication and bookings made by 3rd parties
POS: Enhancement: Extend restricted panels to security groups.
WEB: Enhancement: Web Config: Hide Session End time per TID. 
WEB: Internet Promotions: Exclusion Dates on Internet Promotions
INTEGRATION: Enhancement: N-gage.io app integration for bookings and membership entry.
WEB: Customer Portal: Functionality for visitors and members to see their bookings, resend emails, generate codes to gain access, view memberships status, renew, change contact details.
WEB: Enhancement: Next Gen Web Ticketing: Full revamp of our Web Site Engine, bringing it to more modern standards, making it easier and to update and maintain, and use more modern architectural principles to address availability issue
WEB: MS Clarity behavioral analytics tool
BOS: Back Office: New Icon to open customer search directly 
BOS: PO Screen: Default to order by description ascending rather than auto ID.  
BOS: Permissions: Security option to allow users to amend employee departments. 
BOS: Purchase Orders: Qty in Stock, whole site not just by location, Sold in last 14 days the same 
BOS: Stock take: Add Stock area list to append to description in BO
BOS: Export Account History information to Excel
POS: DNA Payments EFT Integration
WEB: DNA Payments Online
WEB: Block seats from being sold online and reduce capacity
INTEGRATION: Loqate Postcode Lookup integration
BOS: Sage Intacct integration
WEB: Attach PDF copy of confirmation email in confirmation
WEB: Attach documents to confirmation emails
INTEGRATION: TOP/POP: Improvements to service availability
DB: Capacity speed enhancements for events
BOS: Bulk update cost and retail prices
POS: Return visit enhancements
BOS: Iplicit accounts integration
BOS: Bulk batch internet promotion cloning
WEB: Single use internet promotion codes
INTEGRATION: Business Central Integration
BOS: Bulk cancelling and refunding events 
WEB: Add the ability to support the Karna payment system as a method of payment within Stripe/DNA Payments – Alongside Android Pay, Apple Pay and Google Pay.
INTEGRATION: Google Address Search: Natural language entry of customer addresses to our web engine for faster checkout experience
WEB: Seating plan Overlay to show seating plans before choosing tickets.
